1: וְעַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> שְׁמַ֖ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Yet now hear</n> יַעֲקֹ֣ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>O Jacob</n> עַבְדִּ֑י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>my servant</n> וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <sup>977 </sup> <n>whom I have chosen</n> בֽוֹ׃
2: כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עֹשֶׂ֛ךָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that made</n> וְיֹצֶרְךָ֥ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>thee and formed</n> מִבֶּ֖טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>thee from the womb</n> יַעְזְרֶ֑ךָּ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>[which] will help</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָא֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>thee Fear</n> עַבְדִּ֣י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>my servant</n> יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>not O Jacob</n> וִישֻׁר֖וּן <sup>3484 </sup> <n>and thou Jesurun</n> בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <sup>977 </sup> <n>whom I have chosen</n> בֽוֹ׃
3: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶצָּק־ <sup>3332 </sup> <n>For I will pour</n> מַ֙יִם֙ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> צָמֵ֔א <sup>6771 </sup> <n>upon him that is thirsty</n> וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <sup>5140 </sup> <n>and floods</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> יַבָּשָׁ֑ה <sup>3004 </sup> <n>upon the dry ground</n> אֶצֹּ֤ק <sup>3332 </sup> <n>I will pour</n> רוּחִי֙ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>my spirit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>upon thy seed</n> וּבִרְכָתִ֖י <sup>1293 </sup> <n>and my blessing</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> צֶאֱצָאֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>6631 </sup> <n>upon thine offspring</n>
4: וְצָמְח֖וּ <sup>6779 </sup> <n>And they shall spring up</n> בְּבֵ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>[as] among</n> חָצִ֑יר <sup>2682 </sup> <n>the grass</n> כַּעֲרָבִ֖ים <sup>6155 </sup> <n>as willows</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> יִבְלֵי־ <sup>2988 </sup> <n>courses</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>by the water</n>
5: זֶ֤ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> יֹאמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>One shall say</n> לַֽיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD'S</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וְזֶ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>one</n> יִקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and another shall call</n> בְשֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[himself] by the name</n> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> וְזֶ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>and another</n> יִכְתֹּ֤ב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>and another shall subscribe</n> יָדוֹ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[with] his hand</n> לַֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> וּבְשֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[himself] by the name</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> יְכַנֶּֽה׃ <sup>3655 </sup> <n>and surname</n> פ
6: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the King</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְגֹאֲל֖וֹ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>and his redeemer</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֑וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> רִאשׁוֹן֙ <sup>7223 </sup> <n>I [am] the first</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אַחֲר֔וֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>and I [am] the last</n> וּמִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <sup>1107 </sup> <n>and beside</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>me [there is] no God</n>
7: וּמִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> כָמ֣וֹנִי <sup>3644 </sup> <n>is like</n> יִקְרָ֗א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And who as I shall call</n> וְיַגִּידֶ֤הָ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and shall declare</n> וְיַעְרְכֶ֙הָ֙ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>it and set it in order</n> לִ֔י מִשּׂוּמִ֖י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>for me since I appointed</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>nation</n> עוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>the ancient</n> וְאֹתִיּ֛וֹת <sup>857 </sup> <n>the things</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and</n> תָּבֹ֖אנָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>and shall come</n> יַגִּ֥ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>let them shew</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
8: אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּפְחֲדוּ֙ <sup>6342 </sup> <n>Fear</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תִּרְה֔וּ <sup>7297 </sup> <n>be afraid</n> הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> מֵאָ֛ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>thee from that time</n> הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֥יךָ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>have not I told</n> וְהִגַּ֖דְתִּי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and have declared</n> וְאַתֶּ֣ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> עֵדָ֑י <sup>5707 </sup> <n>[it]? ye [are] even my witnesses</n> הֲיֵ֤שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>Is there</n> אֱל֙וֹהַּ֙ <sup>433 </sup> <n>a God</n> מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <sup>1107 </sup> <n>beside</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is there</n> צ֖וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>me? yea [there is] no God</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>lest</n> יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I know</n>
9: יֹֽצְרֵי־ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>They that make</n> פֶ֤סֶל <sup>6459 </sup> <n>a graven image</n> כֻּלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>are all</n> תֹּ֔הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>[are] all of them vanity</n> וַחֲמוּדֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>2530 </sup> <n>and their delectable things</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>no</n> יוֹעִ֑ילוּ <sup>3276 </sup> <n>shall not profit</n> וְעֵדֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5707 </sup> <n>and they [are] their own witnesses</n> הֵׅ֗מָּׅהׅ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>fail</n> יִרְא֛וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>they see</n> וּבַל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>fail</n> יֵדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>not nor know</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>954 </sup> <n>that they may be ashamed</n>
10: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יָצַ֥ר <sup>3335 </sup> <n>Who hath formed</n> אֵ֖ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>a god</n> וּפֶ֣סֶל <sup>6459 </sup> <n>a graven image</n> נָסָ֑ךְ <sup>5258 </sup> <n>or molten</n> לְבִלְתִּ֖י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>to no</n> הוֹעִֽיל׃ <sup>3276 </sup> <n>[that] is profitable</n>
11: הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֲבֵרָיו֙ <sup>2270 </sup> <n>Behold all his fellows</n> יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>shall be ashamed</n> וְחָרָשִׁ֥ים <sup>2796 </sup> <n>and the workmen</n> הֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>themselves</n> מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>they [are] of men</n> יִֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>let them all be gathered together</n> כֻלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יַֽעֲמֹ֔דוּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>let them stand up</n> יִפְחֲד֖וּ <sup>6342 </sup> <n>[yet] they shall fear</n> יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>[and] they shall be ashamed</n> יָֽחַד׃ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n>
12: חָרַ֤שׁ <sup>2796 </sup> <n>shapes</n> בַּרְזֶל֙ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>iron</n> מַֽעֲצָ֔ד <sup>4621 </sup> <n>with the tongs</n> וּפָעַל֙ <sup>6466 </sup> <n>both worketh</n> בַּפֶּחָ֔ם <sup>6352 </sup> <n>in the coals</n> וּבַמַּקָּב֖וֹת <sup>4717 </sup> <n>it with hammers</n> יִצְּרֵ֑הוּ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>and fashioneth</n> וַיִּפְעָלֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6466 </sup> <n>and worketh</n> בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>of his arms</n> כֹּח֔וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>it with the strength</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> רָעֵב֙ <sup>7456 </sup> <n>gets</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>faileth</n> כֹּ֔חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>and his strength</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> שָׁ֥תָה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>he drinketh</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>no water</n> וַיִּיעָֽף׃ <sup>3286 </sup> <n>and is faint</n>
13: חָרַ֣שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>altogether</n> עֵצִים֮ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>wood</n> נָ֣טָה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>stretcheth out</n> קָו֒ <sup>6957 </sup> <n>[his] rule</n> יְתָאֲרֵ֣הוּ <sup>8388 </sup> <n>he marketh it out</n> בַשֶּׂ֔רֶד <sup>8279 </sup> <n>with a line</n> יַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he fitteth</n> בַּמַּקְצֻע֔וֹת <sup>4741 </sup> <n>it with planes</n> וּבַמְּחוּגָ֖ה <sup>4230 </sup> <n>with the compass</n> יְתָאֳרֵ֑הוּ <sup>8388 </sup> <n>and he marketh it out</n> וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and maketh</n> כְּתַבְנִ֣ית <sup>8403 </sup> <n>it after the figure</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of a man</n> כְּתִפְאֶ֥רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>according to the beauty</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of a man</n> לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that it may remain</n> בָּֽיִת׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in the house</n>
14: לִכְרָת־ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>He heweth him down</n> ל֣וֹ אֲרָזִ֔ים <sup>730 </sup> <n>cedars</n> וַיִּקַּ֤ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and taketh</n> תִּרְזָה֙ <sup>8645 </sup> <n>the cypress</n> וְאַלּ֔וֹן <sup>437 </sup> <n>and the oak</n> וַיְאַמֶּץ־ <sup>553 </sup> <n>which he strengtheneth</n> ל֖וֹ בַּעֲצֵי־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>for himself among the trees</n> יָ֑עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of the forest</n> נָטַ֥ע <sup>5193 </sup> <n>he planteth</n> אֹ֖רֶן <sup>766 </sup> <n>an ash</n> וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>and the rain</n> יְגַדֵּֽל׃ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>doth nourish</n>
15: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>becomes</n> לְאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>Then shall it be for a man</n> לְבָעֵ֔ר <sup>1197 </sup> <n>to burn</n> וַיִּקַּ֤ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>for he will take</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>of them</n> וַיָּ֔חָם <sup>2552 </sup> <n>thereof and warm</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> יַשִּׂ֖יק <sup>5400 </sup> <n>himself yea he kindleth</n> וְאָ֣פָה <sup>644 </sup> <n>[it] and baketh</n> לָ֑חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> יִפְעַל־ <sup>6466 </sup> <n>yea he maketh</n> אֵל֙ <sup>410 </sup> <n>a god</n> וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and worshippeth</n> עָשָׂ֥הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[it] he maketh</n> פֶ֖סֶל <sup>6459 </sup> <n>it a graven image</n> וַיִּסְגָּד־ <sup>5456 </sup> <n>and falleth down</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
16: חֶצְיוֹ֙ <sup>2677 </sup> <n>part</n> שָׂרַ֣ף <sup>8313 </sup> <n>He burneth</n> בְּמוֹ־ <sup>1119 </sup> <n>thereof in</n> אֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> חֶצְיוֹ֙ <sup>2677 </sup> <n>with part</n> בָּשָׂ֣ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> יֹאכֵ֔ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>thereof he eateth</n> יִצְלֶ֥ה <sup>6740 </sup> <n>he roasteth</n> צָלִ֖י <sup>6748 </sup> <n>roast</n> וְיִשְׂבָּ֑ע <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and is satisfied</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>also</n> יָחֹם֙ <sup>2552 </sup> <n>yea he warmeth</n> וְיֹאמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[himself] and saith</n> הֶאָ֔ח <sup>1889 </sup> <n>Aha</n> חַמּוֹתִ֖י <sup>2552 </sup> <n>I am warm</n> רָאִ֥יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I have seen</n> אֽוּר׃ <sup>217 </sup> <n>the fire</n>
17: וּשְׁאֵ֣רִית֔וֹ <sup>7611 </sup> <n>And the residue</n> לְאֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>a god</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thereof he maketh</n> לְפִסְל֑וֹ <sup>6459 </sup> <n>[even] his graven image</n> [יִסְגֹּוד־ כ] (יִסְגָּד־ <sup>5456 </sup> <n>falls</n> ל֤וֹ <sup>5456 </sup> <n>he falleth down</n> ק) וְיִשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>unto it and worshippeth</n> וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>[it] and prayeth</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וְיֹאמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto it and saith</n> הַצִּילֵ֔נִי <sup>5337 </sup> <n>Deliver</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵלִ֖י <sup>410 </sup> <n>me for thou [art] my god</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
18: לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>They have not known</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָבִ֑ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>nor understood</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> טַ֤ח <sup>2902 </sup> <n>for he hath shut</n> מֵֽרְאוֹת֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that they cannot see</n> עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>their eyes</n> מֵהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>that they cannot understand</n> לִבֹּתָֽם׃ <sup>3826 </sup> <n>[and] their hearts</n>
19: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יָשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And none considereth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>in</n> לִבּ֗וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in his heart</n> וְלֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> דַ֥עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>neither [is there] knowledge</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תְבוּנָה֮ <sup>8394 </sup> <n>nor understanding</n> לֵאמֹר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>to say</n> חֶצְי֞וֹ <sup>2677 </sup> <n>part</n> שָׂרַ֣פְתִּי <sup>8313 </sup> <n>I have burned</n> בְמוֹ־ <sup>1119 </sup> <n>of it in</n> אֵ֗שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> וְ֠אַף <sup>637 </sup> <n>and also</n> אָפִ֤יתִי <sup>644 </sup> <n>yea also I have baked</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> גֶּחָלָיו֙ <sup>1513 </sup> <n>upon the coals</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> אֶצְלֶ֥ה <sup>6740 </sup> <n>thereof I have roasted</n> בָשָׂ֖ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>flesh</n> וְאֹכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eaten</n> וְיִתְרוֹ֙ <sup>3499 </sup> <n>the residue</n> לְתוֹעֵבָ֣ה <sup>8441 </sup> <n>an abomination</n> אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[it] and shall I make</n> לְב֥וּל <sup>944 </sup> <n>to the stock</n> עֵ֖ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>of wood</n> אֶסְגּֽוֹד׃ <sup>5456 </sup> <n>fall</n>

24: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> גֹּאֲלֶ֔ךָ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>thy redeemer</n> וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>and he that formed</n> מִבָּ֑טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>thee from the womb</n> אָנֹכִ֤י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> עֹ֣שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that maketh</n> כֹּ֔ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> נֹטֶ֤ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>all [things] that stretcheth forth</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> לְבַדִּ֔י <sup>905 </sup> <n>Myself</n> רֹקַ֥ע <sup>7554 </sup> <n>alone that spreadeth abroad</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> [מִי <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waste</n> כ] [אִתִּי כ] (מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> ק)
